    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(float posX,
      float posY,
      int sizeX,
      int sizeY,
      boolean isWalkable,
      java.lang.String path,
      int current,
      int id)
        This function is the player constructor.
        Parameters:
        posX - this is the x position of the player.
        posY - this is the y position of the player.
        sizeX - this is the x size of the player.
        sizeY - this is the y size of the player.
        isWalkable - this parameter indicate if the mobile is walkable or not.
        path - this the path of the player.
        current - It indicate what is the current texture if the mobile have several textures.
        id - This is the id of the player.

        public void collision(int[][] level,
             int nbLines,
             int nbColumns,
             java.util.Vector<Still> stills,
             ControlerPlayer controlPlayer)
        This function manage the collision with the player and the other items in the level.
        Parameters:
        level - this is the level.
        nbLines - this is the number of lines of the level.
        nbColumns - this is the number of columns of the level.
        stills - this is all still element in the level.
        controlPlayer - this is the control player.
